title: The Out-of-Sync Child: Recognizing and Coping with Sensory Processing Disorder
description: This 2nd edition (2005) of "The Out-of-Sync Child" is out of date.  Its information has been significantly updated in the 3rd edition (2022): "The Out-of-Sync Child: Recognizing and Coping with Sensory Processing Differences."
author: Carol Stock Kranowitz
